During the SARS epidemic infected patients reported cases of conjunctivitis where viral RNA was detected from tears 2 of 32 patients.
44 It should have related with some studies showed that main receptor for the entry of the virus into cells is ACE2 located in the alveolar, pulmonary and conjunctival epithelium. Hence, the location of this receptor contributes to severe respiratory disease and conjunctival mucosa.
